system.effect:
The Tau gains the "Follow my Lead" Special Action if they do not already have it. If they did, the bonus it provides increases to +20.
Follow my Lead: Half Action, Concentration: Until the beginning of their next turn, each allied Tau within 10 metres who takes the same Half Action the character takes after performing this one gain +10 to any tests associated with that action.
